name: Jahidul Alam
review: Smile was always insecurity because of the front tooths that did not fit my mouth. After a long 3 years journey of braces treatment from Equity Dental Clinic, I smile now like never before.

name: Ahnaf Zarif
review: I used to have a huge gap between the two Incisor tooths and my friends used to make jokes like 'Can I slide my Credit Card trough that gap?' and it used to hurt me. But my life changed after getting treatment from Equity Dental Clinic.
